greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: T(n, k) = n*k, 0<=k<=n.
comment: T(n, k) = if k=0 then 0 else T(n,k-1)+n;
See the comment in A025581 on a problem posed by François Viète (Vieta) 1593, where this triangle is related to A025581 and A257238. - _Wolfdieter Lang_, May 12 2015
formula: T(n, k) = (A257238(n, k) - A025581(n, k)^3) / (3*A025581(n, k)). See the Viète comment above. - _Wolfdieter Lang_, May 12 2015
G.f. as sequence: -Sum(n >= 0, (n^2-n)*x^(n*(n+1)/2))/(1-x) + Sum(n >= 1, x^(n*(n+1)/2)) * x/(1-x)^2.  These sums are related to Jacobi Theta functions.
xref: Cf. A075362 (without column k=0), A025581, A025581.
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Feb 21 2003
